desc: This book is a fast-paced guide full of step-by-step instructions that teach you how to visualize social data using HTML5 and JavaScript. This book is for developers who are excited about data and who want to share that excitement with others. Developers who are interested in the data which can be extracted from social networks will also find this book hugely beneficial. Readers should have a working knowledge of both JavaScript and HTML.
title: Social Data Visualization with HTML5 and JavaScript
